title: Arrow key navigation doesn't work between tabs with screen reader on
content:
When you are using JAWS 2024 in Edge or Chrome browser, if you use arrow keys for keybord navigation, the focus isn't shifting between different tabs in Service Portal, such as the Your services and assets, Your approvals, Help friends, and Ideas pages tabs.

Cause

This issue caused by the Virtual Cursor function in JAWS. 

Solution

Switch off the Virtual Cursor function in JAWS by pressing INSERT+Z : JAWS has addressed this issue by introducing a toggle-off switch to disable the virtual cursor on chrome with the INSERT+Z command.
